work.summary: GfK Etilize deals with content aggregation and syndication, where we gather trusted information related to the product from Manufacturer or reliable sources to the delivery top most IT industries or Distributors. Automation of manual process with Bash Scripting and Software tools.

Generating reports for the custom requirement.

Store the data into the database and generate reports
